question: Which of the following provisions of the constitution did not come into force on November 26, 1949?
explanation:
Though the constitution came into force on 26<sup>th</sup> Nov 1950. Some provisions relating to citizenship, Elections, Provisional Parliament, temporary and transitional provisions were given immediate effect of 26<sup>th</sup> Nov 1949
The articles which came into force on 26<sup>th</sup> Nov 1949 include articles 5, 6, 8, 9, 60, 324, 366, 372, 388, 391, 392 and 393
